review: i will stay again at this hotel because very comfortable & easy to go anywhere

We had a comfortable and family-friendly stay, with a spacious and clean room that was perfect for our young children. The hotel staff were helpful and accommodating, and we appreciated the quiet environment and convenient location near shops and restaurants. Overall, it was a pleasant and stress-free experience, and we would happily return for another stay.

I was standing in what I thought was a queue only to be cut twice and the staff didn't seem to be bothered to ask who's actually next. Didn't mean to make a fuss but I thought a 5 star establishment shouldn't have missed something so basic.

I booked for a smoking room but was told on check-in that all rooms were non-smoking. No complaint about the room though you could tell the mattress had seen better days from the way it sinks in the middle. But the sheets, the down pillows and the room in general felt clean and fresh.

If you plan to use the sauna and gym be prepared to pay for the drinking water.

20 years ago this was an excellent hotel with world class service and breakfast. This visit the corridor was smelly and so was the room. The bedlinen had staining. One rather old towel per person.  The internet was very slow. Breakfast was unpleasant. The hot food was not hot and it was very crowded. There was a long queue for coffee. We left and had breakfast in the mall.
The staff could not initially find my pre-paid booking, and this was eventually resolved, but we were not shown any hospitality while we waited.

Best room, best food,best facilities and very good staff. The  Location very strategic and easy to go anywhere from the hotel. The price good and dont have to worry about it. When u choice it, u can sleep anytime.

good

Good
Pleasant stay

I decided to stay at this hotel after a tiring shopping trip for school uniforms at SOGO. Taking the LRT to this hotel from Bandaraya Station was very convenient.

I had a fantastic stay . The room was nice and spacious, with all the necessities you’d expect from a 5-star property. The bathroom was clean and had a pleasant fragrance, which made it even more relaxing. The mattress was soft, and the pillow was incredibly fluffy, ensuring a great night’s sleep.

Check-in and check-out were quick and seamless, which I really appreciated. The staff were exceptionally friendly, always ready to assist with a smile. The hotel’s location is also an added advantage, being very close to Sunway Putra Mall and the LRT station, making it super convenient to explore the area.

Additionally, there was a great variety of TV channels to choose from, perfect for winding down after a busy day. Overall, a very pleasant and enjoyable stay!
Terbaik

I had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The room was clean, spacious, and well-equipped with everything I needed for a comfortable visit. However, the only downside was that the toilet bidet was broken and not working, which was quite inconvenient. It would have made the stay perfect if this issue was addressed. I hope the hotel can fix it soon for future guests.

The location of the hotel near the train station was great. It was also close to a big shopping centre with numerous restaurants. The highlight was the amazing buffet breakfast. Something for everyone. The coffee with Illy coffee beans was great too.
The hotel itself is a bit tired but not a big issue for me and the beds were very firm.
Shout out to the concierge. They were very helpful.

The roofed free parking is available but limited as guests has to share with pwtc patrons

I have been staying in this hotel for 3 days while attending a conference.

The place was very clean and spacious. Comes with great aircon and good water pressure. Easy walk to Pavilion and KLCC. Comes with car park but car park can be rather narrow.  Have to pay to use the gym/swimming pool.

I am an Agoda VIP platinum member and have stayed at multiple properties around the region. When I booked this apartment i just told myself i needed a place near the intended building which i had to go to but atlas, I was literally blown away from the beginning- check in was clear, apartment was super clean and we all had a very comfortable stay including my 5 month old baby. They prepared a cot, baby bathtub upon request and due to this gesture it really changes my standard when looking for accommodation from now on. They are impeccable yet very easy to liaise with. You will be blown away!!! Stay here if you’re going to KL!!
The scenery was wow👍👍👍 everything was good.. the condition very clean.. will come again if i come to KL

I totally recommend this place. JP is such a wonderful host, prompt to answer all request and questions. Very accomodating. The place is very nice. If we only knew that this is the best accomodation here in KL, we wouldnt have to transfer hotel.  Will surely stay here again if ever we go back to Malaysia. Will recommend this place to family and friends. Thank you JP and your team 🥰

Thumbs up for the property owner for their prompt reply and service. Place is clean and spacious. Good value for large families. People driving large cars have to be extra careful of the tight carpark.

Staff very helpful

Very satisfied the suits with the friendly customer service, cleanliness and strategic location. They provide towels and toiletries except toothbrush and toothpaste. There is washing and drying machines with the laundry detergent. 
Please keep your good work, I will definitely booked here if I visit KL.

very very clean and neat rooms, staff are very very friendly and reply back through WhatsApp instantly. Every single time I received their replies of my requests or questions within 1 minute!!




room condition is perfect and you can cook simple things at home. 
the night view is fantastic! you can see both  KL TOWER  and the Petronas tower.
I would definitely choose this accommodation when I stay in KL.

We are traveling with parents and small children.  
The apartment is very pleasant.  
The room is very clean.  
The air conditioning is very cool.  
The kitchen is fully equipped.  
There is a washing machine and refrigerator as well.  
Drinking water is available.  
It is very easy to walk to the pavilion and twin towers.  
The owner can help with airport transfer services.  
Everything is very easy.  
It is very enjoyable.  
If we go to Kuala Lumpur again, we will stay here again.  
Highly recommended.

سوهو الحبببب 🥹 يجننن من جميع النواحي نظافههه واطلاله وتعامل ومكان فعلا لو جيت ماليزيا ثاني ماراح افكر بغيره ، تعامللهم يبغاله سطور مدح اخلاق ورغم اني ححزت غرفه والغلط مني الا غيروها لي ونسيت اغراضي عندهم لقيتهم محتفظين فيها لين رجعت ، التقييم فوق التقييم 
تقدرون تتواصلون معاهم واتس اسهل للي مايعرفون انقليزي يردون بسرعه ومتجاوبين حتتى للي رحلتهم اخر الليل تلقون اللي يردد عليكم
Phù hợp với gia đình có trẻ nhỏ

Tôi đặt 1 phòng suite 2 bedrooms cho 5 người. Lúc đặt thì trong options có bồn tắm nhưng khi nhận chỉ có 1 bathroom vòi sen nên 5 người thay phiên nhau tắm hơi bất tiện. Phòng có nhiều ổ cắm nhưng chỉ có 3 cái sử dụng đc. Tuy nhiên ngoài hai vấn đề đó ra thì tất cả đều rất tuyệt vời. Chỉ mất có 10p đi bộ (qua cầu đi bộ có máy lạnh) là đến tháp đôi,15p là đến pavillion. Toà nhà có hồ bơi rộng view đẹp,có cả xông hơi. Phòng có đầy đủ dụng cụ bếp núc,máy giặt máy sấy sử dụng tốt. Đặc biệt chủ căn hộ rất chu đáo, ngày nào cũng nt hỏi có cần dùng thêm khăn or dọn phòng ko (free all service),khi checkout bạn tôi có để quên 1 cái áo cũng đc anh chủ nt báo. Staff cực kì thân thiện và chu đáo như a chủ. Nhất định sẽ quay lại đây ở nếu có đến KL lần nữa.
